name: solr-admin-x
description: Solr Admin X - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd fronend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint || true && cd ../fronend && npm run lint:warn || true
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix || true && cd ../fronend && npm run lint:fix || true
scripts.test:ci: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../fronend && npm run build && docker build -t test-image .
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist fronend/dist backend/node_modules fronend/node_modules node_modules
